items.content_html: üè† A feature-rich but lightweight, buildroot-based Linux operating system alternative for your CloudFree CCU3/ELV-Charly 'homematicIP CCU' IoT smarthome central. items.content_html: ClipX.js is a lightweight JavaScript library for efficient clipboard management, text manipulation, and user feedback. It offers simple copy, cut, and paste operations, basic text formatting, and built-in toast notifications with customizable messages, all in a compact package.
